tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quality_control_inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
  inspection_result BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control_logs (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
  product_id INT,
  quality_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturing_date DATE,
  batch_number INT,
  storage_location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control_log (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    inspector_id INT,
    quality_issue_flag BOOLEAN,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    manufacturing_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE,
    category TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE inspectors (
    inspector_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE quality_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
  inspection_result VARCHAR(50),
  remarks TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_id INT,
  inspection_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control_inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR,
  inspection_result VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR,
  product_type VARCHAR,
  manufacturing_date DATE,
  manufacturer_name VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE inspectors (
  inspector_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspector_name VARCHAR,
  inspector_email VARCHAR,
  inspector_phone VARCHAR,
  supervisor_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE inspection_errors (
  error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_id INT,
  error_description VARCHAR,
  error_type VARCHAR,
  error_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE inspections_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspection_result VARCHAR,
  inspector_name VARCHAR
);
